conversations.content:

For dinner, I want to try a restaurant which serves Chinese cuisine, and find the one with the highest rating.
Tell me how much it costs to eat at each restaurant.

<|Function_Thought|>

The first step is to get all restaurants in the city, which will allow me to further filter down to French and Chinese cuisine and their respective ratings. I will proceed to execute the first function call to gather the restaurant data.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[get_all_restaurants_in_city(city="Paris")]<|/Function_Call|>
